overview: A school teacher risks his life to find his wife, who had left the house during his absences to get some things for their baby, unknowingly that her husband is accused of being a terrorist on the run. The Indian government has amended article 370 from the Indian constitution and denied the special status given to Jammu Kashmir as per article 370 taking over Jammu Kashmir brings it to a LOCKDOWN!
title: Lockdown 370
